html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-01472018-02-15IRCC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to exempt (1) Foreign diplomatic missions or consular posts; (2) International organizations or accredited missions; and (3) the office of political subdivisions of foreign states which benefit from the immunities and privileges set out in the Foreign Missions and International Organizations Act, from the International Mobility Program employer compliance regime, given the Department’s limited capacity to enforce the compliance provisions against them.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0026 Publication Date: 2018-03-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to exempt (1) Foreign diplomatic missions or consular posts; (2) International organizations or accredited missions; and (3) the office of political subdivisions of foreign states which benefit from the immunities and privileges set out in the Foreign Missions and International Organizations Act, from the International Mobility Program employer compliance regime, given the Department’s limited capacity to enforce the compliance provisions against them.
